insights.populationGrowth: Slow 0.9% with extreme remoteness and ethnic subsistence.
insights.educationLevel: Lowest 58% literacy due to ethnic diversity and isolation.
insights.employmentPattern: Subsistence agriculture 70%, forestry 15%, small trade 10%, government 5%.

insights.temperature: Cool mountain (18°C-30°C), highest elevation in northern Laos.
insights.precipitation: Very high 2,500mm with extreme isolation during monsoon.
insights.extremeEvents: Complete monsoon isolation, landslides, ethnic village flooding.

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Very Low - Most remote province, minimal infrastructure
